title: Trump Just Made Urgent Announcement – They Are Complicit in Murder
text:
By economic news
Trump Just Made Urgent Announcement – They Are Complicit in Murder
Monday, January 22, 2018 12:19
 
President Trump is not one to pull his punches when calling out the disgusting filth in our government today. Of course, the left loves to paint Trump and his words as bigoted, racist, transphobic, and whatever else they can throw in there, but we all know he is just calling it as he sees it. So, over the weekend when the Democrats decided to hold the entire nation hostage by shutting down the government over millions of illegals immigrants not granted amnesty, Trump made a video to show the country exactly who these liberals are protecting which everyone needs to see.
It is one thing for politicians to stand up against policies that would harm our country, but it is quite another for them to stand for policies that hurt Americans. Especially, if the party in question is one that touts themselves as the political “savior” for the downtrodden and disenfranchised in our country.
Yes, we are talking about the Democrats in Washington D.C. in case you were wondering.
For the last several years, these enlightened liberals have been busy pushing for amnesty for millions of illegal immigrants in the country despite the overwhelming support for these lawbreakers to be kicked out. However, instead of these illegals being rounded up and shipped back to where they came from liberals are hiding these criminals in sanctuary cities defying federal immigration laws to kick them out.
Trump has stated that this blatant disrespect for our laws must end, but that has not stopped these anti-American leftists from pushing forward with destroying our nation. So, when the Democrats said they would shut the government down if Republicans and President Trump did not allow the Dreamers to stay in the country, the administration did not balk, but just released a video showing who these liberals are fighting to keep here.
The video released yesterday perfectly depicts how the rise in violent crime in our country is attributed to illegals coming in from Mexico. Trump’s video shows that Democrats are the ones who are in fact, complicit in the murders that have occurred in our nation and that they rather fight for them then for the millions of United States citizens here legally.
